context_of_use: Admin users need to monitor business performance through sales metrics and reports.
description: Enable admins to view sales metrics and performance reports to monitor business health.
triggering_event: Admin requests to view sales reports.
preconditions: Admin has access to sales reporting features.
postconditions: Admin successfully views the sales reports.
assumptions: The system has up-to-date sales data.
The admin has the necessary permissions to view reports.
main_flow: 1. Admin requests to view sales reports → System displays the sales report interface.
2. Admin selects the desired report parameters → System retrieves and displays the relevant sales data.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 1): Admin cancels the request → System returns to the previous screen.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): System encounters an error retrieving data → System displays an error message to the admin.
